defaultView.title: Off Facebook activity ranking
defaultView.text: See how many times third parties have informed Facebook of your activity outside of Facebook.

defaultView.title: Off Facebook activity type
defaultView.text: See which kind of information advertisers have shared with Facebook of your activity outside of Facebook.

defaultView.title: Ad interactions
defaultView.text: See the list of ads with which you have interacted.

defaultView.title: Inferred interests
defaultView.text: Get a list of topics that Facebook thinks you're interested in.

defaultView.title: Contact list
defaultView.text: Get a list of advertisers that have uploaded a contact list containing you.

defaultView.title: Dated observations
defaultView.text: See all the dated events in your files, corresponding to data that has been collected on you at or concerning a specific date.
